text: The Paraguay national under-17 football team represents Paraguay in the under-17 international football team. They have competed in both the FIFA U-17 World Cup and the South American Under-17 Football Championship. They have been to the quarterfinals in both the 1999 FIFA U-17 World Championship and the 2019 FIFA U-17 World Cup. ==Tournament records== ===FIFA U-17 World Cup=== FIFA U-17 World Cup record FIFA
